ðŸ“– Summary: ShortMoji is a lightweight Python application that allows users to quickly insert emojis and special characters using simple keyboard shortcuts, similar to Discord's emoji system. It provides a convenient way to enhance text input with visual elements without needing to browse through extensive emoji libraries or character maps. The application supports a wide range of emojis and special characters, accessible through easy-to-remember shortcuts.
